steps.221: Add-1/2 tsp baking powder to a blender
steps.222: Serve-Serve the pancakes with chopped strawberries
steps.223: Melt-Melt a small knob of butter in a non-stick frying pan over low-medium heat
steps.226: Cook-Cook for 1 min or until the tops start to bubble
steps.228: Flip-Flip the pancakes with a fork or a fish slice spatula
steps.231: Pour-Pour three little puddles straight from the blender into the frying pan
steps.232: Add-1 heaped tbsp flour to a blender
